mapper.insert: INSERT INTO m_QnA(qnaid, title, content, memberid, cdate, grpno) VALUES((SELECT NVL(MAX(qnaid), 0) + 1 as qnaid FROM m_QnA), #{title}, #{content}, #{memberid}, sysdate, (SELECT NVL(MAX(grpno),0) + 1 as grpno from m_QnA))

INSERT INTO m_qna (qnaid, title, content, memberid, cdate, grpno, indent, ansnum, refno) VALUES((SELECT NVL(MAX(qnaid), 0) + 1 as qnaid FROM m_QnA), #{title}, #{content}, #{memberid}, sysdate, #{grpno}, #{indent}+1, #{ansnum}+1, #{qnaid})
mapper.select: SELECT qnaid, title, grpno, indent, ansnum FROM m_QnA WHERE qnaid = #{qnaid} ORDER BY qnaid DESC
